nodesToRead.speaker: Trish
lines: Heyyy! You're new around here ain'tcha?!
Well come on, don't be shy! I don't peck!
I'm Trish! I'm in charge of running Trivia night here at the Boozy Burrow!
The way it works is that I'll ask ya a quick question, and if you give me a right answer, you win some cold hard cash!
Base line bets are $1, but you can bump that up if you'd like!
<size=50>Or...if you get carried away with that good ol' 'Liquid Courage...</size>'
Oh-- I also have to understand what you're saying, cause I'm a toucan, not a mind reader.
OKOKOK Here we go! <size=50>I love my JOB!!</size>

nodesToRead.speaker: Trish
lines: Heyyy you! Back for more TRIVIA?
